attributes.action: CAMERON TO STAY AS PRIME MINISTER AND FORGE AN AGREEMENT WITH EUROPE.
attributes.additional_details:
The only countries that benefit from the EU are Germany and the minor eastern countries. Europe accepted Germany's argument that East Germany could be included as "an expansion". It took many years before Germany were back with a reasonable GDP. When comparing what we pay and what we get back 2 countries, UK and Netherlands get just over 1/2 back. Germany gets about 65% back.

http://www.theguardian.com/news/datablog/2012/nov/22/eu-budget-spending-contributions-european-union
attributes.background: Cameron did warn of economic problems. He didn't appreciate the Nationalism angle. If we had voted REMAIN, we would have been swallowed up by Europe. With Cameron in charge, he knows the people involved and can strike a deal from a position of POWER with "I said this could happen. NOW LET'S TALK"
